column1: Grithnir was a servant of the House of Hador. In the prime of his life
column3: Grithnir was said to have travelled widely in Beleriand
column4: and come to know its ways well. For this reason
column6: he was selected by Morwen as one on the two guides to travel to Doriath with her son Túrin. They were successful
column7: and Túrin was taken into King Thingols court
column9: Grithnir never saw his northern homelands again. He became sick while a guest in Menegroth
column10: and died before he could make the journey home.
